==== usage.js (0 errors) ====
    const { Thing, useThing, cbThing } = require("./index");
    
    useThing(Thing.a);
    
    /**
     * @typedef {Object} LogEntry
     * @property {string} type
     * @property {number} time
     */
    
    cbThing(type => {
        /** @type {LogEntry} */
        const logEntry = {
            time: Date.now(),
            type,
        };
    });

    const Thing = Object.freeze({
        a: "thing",

    exports.Thing = Thing;
